content: this sides will look like this ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira diagram main ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira pattern napkin ring you will be working inside the wooden ring start with a slip knot and attach yarn with a standing single_crochet counts as st to the wooden ring video tutorial below round 1 make 43 single_crochet or a multiple of 4 until your wooden ring is all covered 44 sts join with slip_stitch round 2 ch1 *single_crochet in the next st sk1 st 5dc in the next st sk1 st* repeat from * to * until end join to the 1st single_crochet of the round congratulations standing single_crochet - video from tamara coaster placemat and napkin ring completed kelly from moogly on youtube for guidance https //youtu be/8msveiid2uy ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira testers projects name roopa shree k name tamara dixon name shivalika sachdeva ig ig ig @crochetluv_rsk @handmade by tam @manujshivi name marilou samuelsen name vinita karnani name shruti bhansali ig ig ig @marilouisabelle @onn ishq @knotty_hooks contact i d love to see all your projects so please tag me on social media for any questions/enquires instagram @jeijeicro analmteixeira@hotmail com use hashtags #lotussetpattern #lotusplacemat #lotuscoaster follow me and direct message on ig @jeijeicro support on ko-fi jeijeicro shop on ravelry jeijeicro ©copyright 2023 ana luísa moreno teixeira
